I am ...

I am Rohit, a fifth year graduate student at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. I am broadly interested in algebraic combinatorics, modular representation theory, homological stabilization and it's applications to geometry. My research advisor is Jordan Ellenberg.

Before coming to Madison I did my masters in Mathematics and Scientific Computing at Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur .

I could be contacted via email.

The website is developed using the Jekyll static site generator.
